author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO ENTERS THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN AS A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE...
summary: ...KIKO ENTERS THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN AS A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... As of 5:00 AM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 15.5, -140.5 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 948 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO ENTERS THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN AS A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... As of 5:00 AM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 15.5, -140.5 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 948 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
